name: A. ACM ICPC
statement:
In a small but very proud high school it was decided to win ACM ICPC.
This goal requires to compose as many teams of three as possible, but
since there were only students who wished to participate, the decision
was to build exactly two teams.After practice competition, participant
number got a of . is defined as sum of scores of its participants. High
school management is interested if it’s possible to build two teams with
equal scores. Your task is to answer that question.
